text: "Stark Raving Dad" is the season premiere episode of The Simpsons third season. It first started on the Fox network in the United States on September 19, 1991. In this episode, Homer is made to wear a pink shirt to work one day and is mistaken for a "free thinking anarchist" and sent to a "mental institution." He's in a room with a large white man who acts as if he were Michael Jackson. == Other websites == * * * Category:1991 television episodes Category:The Simpsons (season 3) episodes Category:Television episodes about birthdays
title: Stark Raving Dad
